named-native-query.name: SaldoModel.buscaPorCpf
named-native-query.query: select sal.* from NFP_ContaCorrente..Saldo sal, NFP_ContaCorrente..ContaCorrente cco where sal.pkSaldo = cco.pkConta and cco.strCpfCnpjUser = ?1

named-native-query.name: SaldoModel.buscaPorSaldoMenorQue
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Saldo where valvalorsaldo < ?1 order by valvalorsaldo

named-native-query.name: SaldoModel.buscaPorSaldoIgualA
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Saldo where valvalorsaldo = ?1 order by valvalorsaldo

named-native-query.name: SaldoModel.buscaPorSaldoMaiorQue
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Saldo where valvalorsaldo > ?1 order by valvalorsaldo

named-native-query.name: SaldoModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..Saldo order by valvalorsaldo
